cause.description:
Every so often El Diablo strikes and it usually hurts. Sometimes people die. It is thus neccessary for a person to get the hell out of El Diablo's way. This is our goal at El Diablo Striketh!!!!!!! (trademark only viable to court approved copywright) - to see that as many people as possible not get struck by El Diablo. Enjoy life without the fear of being struck by El Diablo - join today!
Sincerely,
Alex Elmaleh
CEO and Founder of El Diablo Striketh!!!!!! (trademark only viable to court approved copywright)
1. El Diablo strikes people
2. Getting struck hurts
3. You should avoid getting struck
cause.mission: Not Be Struck By El Diablo
cause.name: El Diablo Striketh!!!!!!!!
